term.title: Hantzsch–Widman name

item.text: A name for a heteromonocyclic parent hydride having no more than ten ring members formed by the citation of 'a' prefixes denoting the heteroatoms followed by an ending (the 'stem') defining the size of the ring.

item.title: Wikipedia - ハンチュ-ウィドマン命名法 (ja)
item.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ハンチュ-ウィドマン命名法

item.title: Wikipedia - 汉奇-威德曼杂环命名系统 (zh)
